transcript:
Customer: Ye over dono galti ho gayi hai.
Executive: Aap jis se bhi
(ringing)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Salim ji Pasand Steel se baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ji good afternoon sir, main Shubham baat kar raha tha IndiaMART head office se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Hmm. Badhiya.
Executive: Ji. Actually isliye hai ki sir aapka na ek discussion chali raha tha sir, toh Avneesh se aapka discussion hua hoga. I think aapne ek wo feedback dala tha toh uske concern ko close karne ke liye kuch jo bhi workout tha wo usne bataya hoga sir aapse. Toh wo concern close karne ke liye maine call kiya tha ki ye concern hum close kar rahe hain. Dusra isme na sir aapka ek mere ko discussion ye karna tha ki aapke yahan pe na ek product hai sir. Hmm. Matlab kaafi saare products aise hain jo inactive kar diye gaye hain. Matlab main bata de raha hun. Jaise MS plate cutting, electric motors, thick clarifiers, centrifugal oil separators, used gearbox, three phase electric motors, used steel plates hain. Bahut saare products hain jo humne bahut saare inactive kiye hain. Matlab there are around 40, 40-45 categories aisi hain jo humne jo humne inactive kar diye hain.
Customer: [unintelligible] [unintelligible] [unintelligible]
Customer: Haan. Haan bataiye.
Executive: Hello. Haan. Ji toh main keh raha hun sir 40-45 categories aisi hain jo humne deactivate ki hui hain. Gearboxes, fish finders, decenters, centrifugal, oil centrifugal machine, worms, production gears, oil water separators, tractor wheel plates, profile cutting service, worm gearbox, marine GPS, industrial gearbox, bahut saari categories hain cutting services hain marine turbo charger. Aap nahi nahi wo wo theek hai item nahi ginna hai. Kya hai issue bataiye?
Executive: Main bas ye sir actually concern main close kara raha tha. Main aapse ye samajhna chah raha tha ki ye sab categories mein humne deal karna band kar diya hai toh inhe inactive hi rehne dena hai. Agar aap allow aap agar allow kare toh hum inhe aap agar bolenge toh hum inhe active bhi kar denge sir. I just want to know.
Customer: Kaise meri Avinash ji se baat hui thi.
Executive: Ji. Hello. Haan ji haan ji bata raha hai. Avinash ji aisa bata rahe the. Haan ji. Ke hum sab kuch active kar dete hain. Main bola aap ab ruko. Do char do char product ek ek tarah se active karte hain. Achcha achcha achcha achcha. Fir fir dekhte hain ki usme kitna grow aata hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap toh fir bataiye koi product aap matlab aap hi khud hi active karenge ya aap agar bole toh hum active karte hain bataiye sir.
Customer: Maine wo sab bata rakha hai abhi. Avinash Avneesh ko. Haan. Shayad usne kiya nahi kiya mujhe malum nahi dekha nahi maine. Lekin sir hua hai toh main main baat kar leta hun ek baar Avneesh se sir. Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Baaki main concern close kar de raha hun sir. Theek hai na Salim ji?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about inactive products.

- Wants to activate products gradually.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about inactive products.

- Executive agreed to contact Avneesh regarding activation.

- Executive closed the concern.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inactive products, activation, concern
